tool_description: Data to regulate your physical condition, Calculate Your BMI (body mass index).
name: Health
title: Health

api_list.name: /bmi
api_list.description: Returns the physical state of the body and the number of total muscle mass.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: height of a person. Accept meters or feet.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: Weight of a person. Accept kilos or pounds.
